infra_spec: Provision an AWS S3 bucket with versioning and default SSE-S3 encryption enabled
Create an AWS IAM role for EC2 with a policy allowing read-only access to S3
Build an AWS VPC (10.0.0.0/16) with one public and two private subnets across 2 AZs
Launch an AWS RDS PostgreSQL instance in Multi-AZ with automated backups retained for 7 days
Deploy an AWS Application Load Balancer fronting an Auto Scaling Group of EC2 instances
Configure AWS CloudFront with an S3 origin and cache policy for static assets
Stand up an Amazon EKS cluster with a managed node group and cluster-autoscaler
Create an AWS Lambda function with an execution role and log group (14-day retention)
Set up an SNS topic with an SQS queue subscription using raw message delivery
Create an AWS Secrets Manager secret with a rotation schedule of 30 days
Provision a customer-managed AWS KMS key and alias for encrypting S3 and EBS
Create a CloudWatch Log Group with 90-day retention and metric filter for ERRORs
Add a Route53 public A record pointing to an ALB using alias targeting
Attach AWS WAFv2 to an ALB with managed rule groups enabled
Create an S3 bucket for ALB access logs with bucket policy allowing write from ALB
Deploy an ECS Fargate service with a private subnet and a public ALB listener
Provision an API Gateway REST API integrated with a Lambda function (proxy mode)
Create an ElastiCache Redis cluster in a private subnet with at-rest encryption
Create an ECR repository with a lifecycle policy to keep the last 10 images
Store an application config value in SSM Parameter Store as a SecureString
Create a GCP GCS bucket with object versioning and a 30-day lifecycle rule
Provision a GKE cluster with Workload Identity and a default node pool
Deploy a Google Cloud SQL for Postgres instance with automated backups and PITR
Create a Pub/Sub topic and a pull subscription with dead-letter policy
Deploy a Cloud Run service with min instances = 1 and ingress internal-and-cloud-load-balancing
Create a GCP VPC network with two subnets and private Google access enabled
Create a GCP service account and bind roles/logging.logWriter at project scope
Provision a GCP KMS key ring and a crypto key with automatic rotation every 90 days
Create a Cloud Monitoring alert policy for VM CPU > 80% for 5 minutes
Configure a global HTTPS load balancer with managed certificate and backend service
Create an Azure storage account (Standard_LRS) with a private blob container
Provision an Azure AKS cluster with RBAC enabled and a system node pool
Deploy an Azure App Service Plan (Linux) and a Node.js Web App with daily backups
Create an Azure SQL Server and database with geo-redundant backup policy
Set up an Azure Key Vault with purge protection and a secret seeded from a variable
Build an Azure Virtual Network with address space 10.2.0.0/16 and two subnets
Deploy an Azure Application Gateway with WAF in Prevention mode
Provision Azure Cache for Redis (Standard C1) with TLS-only access
Create a Log Analytics Workspace with 30-day retention and link to an AKS cluster
Assign a built-in Azure Policy to enforce HTTPS-only storage accounts at the subscription scope
Create Azure Front Door (Standard) with an origin pointing to an App Service and enable HTTPS
Provision an Azure Service Bus namespace with a queue and lock duration of 60 seconds
Create an Azure Event Hubs namespace with a hub and capture to a storage account
Deploy an Azure Container Registry (Premium) with soft delete enabled
Create a VM Scale Set with Ubuntu images, autoscale between 1 and 3 instances
Provision Azure Cosmos DB (SQL API) with autoscale throughput and two regions
Create a Recovery Services Vault and a backup policy for daily VM backups
Set up an Azure DNS public zone and an A record pointing to a static public IP
Deploy Azure Firewall with a DNAT rule and send logs to Log Analytics
Create an Azure Monitor metric alert for App Service CPU > 80% for 10 minutes
Create a resource group in West Europe named rg-app-west-eu for app workloads
Deploy a Storage Account (Standard_LRS) with a private blob container and soft delete enabled
Provision a Virtual Network (10.10.0.0/16) with web and data subnets
Create a Network Security Group with an inbound rule allowing HTTPS from Internet
Allocate a static Standard public IP address for a load balancer
Deploy a Basic Load Balancer with a backend pool and health probe on port 80
Create a Linux VM with a system-assigned managed identity and OS disk encryption enabled
Provision an Azure Key Vault with RBAC authorization and a seeded secret named app-config
Deploy an Azure SQL server and database, add firewall rule to allow Azure services
Create an App Service Plan (Linux) and a Web App using Node 18 runtime with app settings
Deploy an Application Insights instance and link it to an existing Web App
Create an AKS cluster with RBAC enabled and a system node pool with autoscaling
Provision an Azure Container Registry with admin user disabled and retention policy 7 days
Deploy an Application Gateway with WAF policy in Prevention mode and listener on 443
Create an Azure Front Door Standard profile with a custom domain and managed HTTPS
Provision a Traffic Manager profile (Priority routing) with two endpoints in different regions
Create a Private DNS zone for privatelink.blob.core.windows.net and link to a VNet
Add a Private Endpoint for a Storage Account to a subnet in the application VNet
Deploy a Service Bus namespace with a queue and dead-lettering enabled
Create an Event Hubs namespace with a hub configured for capture to a storage account
Deploy a Function App (Consumption) with a system-assigned identity and App Insights
Create a Logic App Standard with an HTTP trigger and a managed identity
Provision a Cosmos DB account (SQL API) with autoscale and multi-region writes
Create Azure Cache for Redis (Standard) with virtual network injection
Deploy a Recovery Services Vault and define a daily backup policy for VMs
Enable backup on an existing VM using the defined Recovery Services Vault policy
Create a DDoS Protection Standard plan and associate it with a VNet
Deploy Azure Bastion in a dedicated subnet to enable secure VM access
Create a NAT Gateway and associate it with a subnet for outbound SNAT
Provision a Route Table with a default route to a virtual appliance and associate to a subnet
Assign the built-in policy to require HTTPS-only on storage accounts at resource group scope
Enable diagnostic settings on a Storage Account to send logs to Log Analytics
Create a Log Analytics workspace with 30-day retention and link to VM insights
Create a metric alert for VM CPU percentage > 80% for 10 minutes with email action group
Provision an Automation Account with a runbook and schedule to stop VMs nightly
Deploy an Azure Data Factory with managed virtual network enabled
Create an Azure Synapse workspace with a default SQL pool and managed private endpoints
Provision an Azure Purview (Microsoft Purview) account in a dedicated resource group
Deploy an Azure Databricks workspace with VNet injection and private subnets
Create an API Management service (Consumption) with a backend API and a product
Set up an Azure CDN Standard profile and endpoint with a custom domain and HTTPS
Create a Storage Account with hierarchical namespace (Data Lake Gen2) and a filesystem
Add an AKS user node pool with autoscaling between 1 and 5 nodes
Configure autoscale on a VM Scale Set based on average CPU thresholds
Create a Disk Encryption Set backed by a customer-managed key in Key Vault
Provision a managed disk encrypted with a Disk Encryption Set and attach to a VM
Deploy a VM with boot diagnostics enabled to a storage account
Create an Availability Set with two fault domains and five update domains
Create a Proximity Placement Group and place a VM and VMSS in it for low latency
Deploy an App Service with a system-assigned managed identity and assign Key Vault access
